LanguageData.STR_grilledmeat.label: Strange Cheese Burger
LanguageData.STR_grilledmeat.description: Two slices of bread with grilled strange meat and cheese melt. \n\nFood Effects: Metabolism.
LanguageData.STR_pizza.label: Strange pizza
LanguageData.STR_pizza.description: Strangepizza in 30 minutes or less! \n\nFood Effects: Consciousness and Metabolism.
LanguageData.STR_Tacos.label: Strange Tacos
LanguageData.STR_Tacos.description: Strange Meat and Cheese in a Corn shell. \n\nFood Effects: Manipulation and Metabolism.
LanguageData.STR_Grilledsteak.label: Grilled Strange Steak
LanguageData.STR_Grilledsteak.description: Strange meat that has been cooked over a grill.
LanguageData.STR_Kabob.label: Grilled Strange Kabob
LanguageData.STR_Kabob.description: Strange meats and Vegetables skewered on a stick and grilled to perfection.
LanguageData.STR_meatpie.label: Strange meat pie
LanguageData.STR_meatpie.description: A simple baked pie with a filling of strange meat.
LanguageData.STR_bowlstew.label: Bowl of strange stew
LanguageData.STR_bowlstew.description: A bowl of slow cooking strange stew. \n\nFood Effects: Consciousness, Metabolism, Blood Filtration, and Blood Pumping.
LanguageData.STR_stirfry.label: Strange stirfry
LanguageData.STR_stirfry.description: Cooking technique in which ingredients are fried in a small amount of very hot oil. \n\nFood Effects: Manipulation and Blood Filtration.
LanguageData.STR_SaltedMeat.label: Salted strange meat
LanguageData.STR_SaltedMeat.description: Strange meat that has been cured with salt.
LanguageData.STR_Pemmican.label: strange pemmican
LanguageData.STR_Pemmican.description: A preserved mashed mixture of strange fat and plant food. Tastes bland, but not offensive. It lasts a very long time without refrigeration.
LanguageData.STR_SurvivalPack.label: packaged survival strange meal
LanguageData.STR_SurvivalPack.description: A high-quality strange packaged meal, manufactured for use in survival situations.
